text: On 28 January 2024, the Tower 22 United States military outpost in Jordan was attacked by Islamic Resistance in Iraq. The attack resulted in the deaths of three American soldiers. At least 34 other soldiers were injured. == Related pages == * List of military operations during 2024 * Red Sea Crisis ==References== Category:Battles involving the United States Category:January 2024 events Category:2024 in Iran
title: Tower 22 drone attack
